fields.text: If only the dollars in my account weren't virtual... perhaps my wife wouldn't have left me :(
My coke habit is becoming far too expensive. I'm thinking if I put the money into bitcoin instead I can finally earn back the money I've snorted
Sure, add gambling to your list of addictions, why not?
Hi im 7 years old i found this website by mistake I already lost like forty thoisand dollers im scared please dont tell mum
I've been selling our household items on ebay like there's no tomorrow. Been put in the dog house more than once for being a naughty salesman. But on here all I do is buy! Look at me now, Dennis!
Guys i lost everything. my house my car my dog my wallet. now ive just lost 12 virtual dollars in the space of a week. god help me
